attributes.title: S C A R Y
attributes.review: i opened the app and this orange cheeto came out at me😣😖i just wasnt ready i dropped my baby and my friend mac and cheese ball from cheesecake factory on the ground. 😔 such a waste of money😢

attributes.title: Not a good app
attributes.review: This app is not the best I tried it and it wouldn’t let me open the app so I have to say this app is the worst app in the world

attributes.title: Racist orange
attributes.review: So you think you can take down tiktok because its Chinese????? I can’t believe you think rumors are real.

attributes.title: Dumb
attributes.review: My dogs Daugherty grandmother was trying to figure out how to walk but the app just kept playing the wii theme song!

attributes.title: Meh
attributes.review: It was about as lame as I expected. Not very well thought out and I hate apps that spam my phone.

attributes.title: garbage
attributes.review: do not download this app i’m warning you literal garbage worst president in the history of america and this app needs to be taken down for how bad it is (if you know what i’m saying😏) the news does not describe anything nor is it accurate, thank you for your time!

attributes.title: Horrible
attributes.review: This app is full of misinformation and raciest agenda. I got to see how trump plans to campaign, but it broke down my phone. 0/5

attributes.title: Would give zero stars if I could
attributes.review: Every time I open the app some small orange man pops up and harasses me

attributes.title: ✨Hehe✨
attributes.review: I really don’t like trump in general so when I found out he had his own app...I was like nope nope nope. We don’t need more people like this...mister.

attributes.title: I’m shaking and crying
attributes.review: In the time it took for this app to download my wife took the children and left me. Terrible app. #settleforbiden2020
